text: The Four Corners is the place in the Southwestern United States where the four corners of New Mexico, Colorado, Utah, and Arizona meet. Three of the four corners (AZ, NM, UT) are on the Navajo Indian Reservation and the fourth corner (CO) is on the Ute Mountain Indian Reservation. The Four Corners Monument is at the coordinates . ==References== Category:Geography of New Mexico Category:Geography of Colorado Category:Geography of Utah Category:Geography of Arizona
title: Four Corners
